introduction.text1: In my programming path, I worked as a Freelancer, have done pages based on Wordpress, and creating custom themes. In those projects, I used JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, and CSS (Sass).
introduction.text2: Since 2021 I have been working in
introduction.text3: In my daily responsibilities at work, I was providing high-quality software in accordance with the client's specifications and requirements. Software development of the programming and testing environment. I participate in project meetings and meetings with clients. In my projects, I use JavaScript, React, Redux, React-native, basic PHP, Material Ui, Chakra UI, React-strap, and MySQL database.
introduction.text4: I am able to navigate between different technologies, I have no problem with reading technologies documentation or looking for solutions for current problems which appear during work.

item3.text: Looking after elderly persons and disabled persons. Assistance in their daily life.
